name: Laser Guy (Harold)
description:
> PLAY LIKE A SHOOTER, FEEL LIKE A PUZZLE <

Top-Down shooter about an alien in the midst of an allergic crisis at his work, releasing a constant destructive laser rushing through several rooms without harming any co-worker until he arrives at the infirmary.

> HOW TO PLAY <

-ASWD controls the caracter and mouse/touchpad controls the aim.

- Play through your browser on the player above or download the windows version bellow (gmtk20 edition if you intend to rate us)

> THIS IS A GMTK20 SUBSCRIPTION <

The game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2020 here on itch.io in just 48 hours by a team of 6 friends. The versions available to play on the page were submitted within the time limit of the event and therefore cannot be updated until the conclusion of the event on July 19th.

We decided to provide an updated version (windows only) right after the submission (about an hour) where we removed some bugs that blocked the player's progress. If you are going to rate our game, please consider only the gmtk20 versions found on this page.

After the end of the jam, this page will only have updated versions of the game, so if you are interested in following our updates just add to your collection to receive news! : D
